game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs the game and maintains a connection to the database for pushing and updating game data.
    Author:
    magnubau, williad, heleneyj

      A constructor for the Game class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        A constructor for the Game class. It initializes the level. If the user is a host, it adds the monsters to the lobby. It adds all the creatures in te lobby to the ArrayList creatures. It also sets the Creature with player id equal to the users player id, to playerCharacter

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Fetches and pushes data to the database.
        This method serves as one cycle of the game.

      • resetPlayerTurn

        public void resetPlayerTurn()
        Resets the player turn on client and in the database.
        Used when changing to a new level.

      • pushNewLevel

        public void pushNewLevel()
        Pushes data about the next level to the database.

      • assureNoOverlap

        public void assureNoOverlap()
        Assures that all creatures are placed in unique cells

      • upgradePlayerStats

        public void upgradePlayerStats()
        Increases the hp and damagebonus for every Character

      • addNewMonstersToLobby

        public void addNewMonstersToLobby(int levelId,
                                  int playerAmount)
        Adds new monsters from a specific level to the game lobby
        Parameters:
        levelId - level id
        playerAmount - amount of player

      • updateCreatureData

        public void updateCreatureData()
        Method fetches data from the database and updates the client data using this

      • pushCreatureData

        public void pushCreatureData()
        Sends Creature data from klient to database. Updates position and health points.

      • handleCreatureData

        public void handleCreatureData()
        sends message to chat that the user is dead, if playerCharacters hp less than or equal to 0. Sets isDead = true for all creatures with hp less than or equal to 0.

      • updatePlayerTurn

        public void updatePlayerTurn()
        Update the value for playerTurn from the database

      • getCreatures

        public java.util.ArrayList<Creature> getCreatures()
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of the creatures

      • getCharacters

        public java.util.ArrayList<Character> getCharacters()
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of the characters

      • isPlayerCharacterTurn

        public boolean isPlayerCharacterTurn()
        Checks if it is playerCharacters turn.
        Returns:
        true if playerCharacters turn, false otherwise.

      • isMonsterTurn

        public boolean isMonsterTurn()
        Checks if it is a Monsters turn.
        Returns:
        true if a Monsters turn, false otherwise.

      • updatePlayersReadyForNewLevel

        public void updatePlayersReadyForNewLevel()
        Updates the data for players being ready to transition to the new level

      • allPlayersReadyForNewLevel

        public boolean allPlayersReadyForNewLevel()
        Checks if all players are ready for new level.
        This variable is used to ensure that no player falls behind, or that no players fetches creatures from the lobby before the host has added these
        Returns:
        true, if all players are ready for new level, false otherwise.

      • setPlayerReadyForNewLevel

        public void setPlayerReadyForNewLevel(boolean ready)
        Sets the value in both the client and the database
        Parameters:
        ready - boolean to set

      • getMonsters

        public java.util.ArrayList<Monster> getMonsters()
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all monsters in creatures.

      • isLevelCleared

        public boolean isLevelCleared()
        Checks if all monsters are dead. If all monsters are dead the level is cleared.
        Returns:
        true if all monsters are dead, false otherwise

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Checks if all characters are dead. If all characters are dead it is game over.
        Returns:
        true if all characters are dead, false otherwise.

      • changeToNewLevel

        public void changeToNewLevel()
        Fetches the next level from the database and changes to it

      • monsterAction

        public void monsterAction()
        Handels the turn of all monsters. Moves, attacks and ends turn.

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        Increments the turn for both client and database.

      • getLevel

        public Level getLevel()
        Returns:
        The level.

      • getAmountOfLevels

        public int getAmountOfLevels()
        Returns:
        amountOfLevels

      • attackRange

        public boolean attackRange(Monster monster,
                           boolean melee)
        Checks if a Monster is within the correct range to attack it. playerCharacter must be adjacent to a Monster to attack it with melee weapons. playerCharacter needs to be anywhere but adjacent to a Monster to attack with ranged weapons.
        Parameters:
        monster - The target Monster.
        melee - boolean to tell if it is a check for melle or ranged attack.
        Returns:
        true if melee = true and within melee range, true if melee = false and within ranged range, false otherwise.

      • setCreatures

        public void setCreatures(java.util.ArrayList<Creature> creatureList)
        Parameters:
        creatureList - ArrayList to be set

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(Level level)
        Parameters:
        level - level-object to be set

      • incrementPlayerTurn

        public void incrementPlayerTurn()
        Increments the playerTurn

        public int getPlayerTurn()
        Returns:
        player turn

        Parameters:
        playerTurn - turn to be set

      • getPlayerCharacter

        public Character getPlayerCharacter()
        Returns:
        the character the player is playing as

        Parameters:
